description: First attested in the 1930s, of uncertain origin. Perhaps related to French fanfaron (“boasting”).

entries.meaning: Overly excessive or flashy ornamentation or decoration.
examples: The thumping bands, the badges, the pretty girls and all the time-honored foofaraw failed to charge up the Republican batteries to the sparking point. The great engine just would not turn over — at the start.

entries.meaning: Fuss over something of little importance.
